conclusion: Preliminary objection dismissed;Remainder inadmissible;No violation of Article 2 of Protocol No. 1 - Right to education-{general} (Article 2 of Protocol No. 1 - Right to education) (the Republic of Moldova);Violation of Article 2 of Protocol No. 1 - Right to education-{general} (Article 2 of Protocol No. 1 - Respect for parents' philosophical convictions;Right to education) (Russia);Non-pecuniary damage - award
docname: CASE OF CATAN AND OTHERS v. THE REPUBLIC OF MOLDOVA AND RUSSIA - [Armenian Translation] by the COE Human Rights Trust Fund

issue: Article 6 of the Moldavian Republic of Transdniestria Law on languages
